name: Ginger Ale
description: Sasha Petraske’s ginger ale base at Drinkshop calls for lime juice instead of lemon. It is an ingredient in the slyly named Presbyterian, which includes bourbon or rum blended with ale and club soda, and topped with a twist of lemon.
keywords: club soda, ginger juice, lime, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice plus lime wedge, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Stir ginger juice, sugar and lime juice in 16-ounce glass until sugar is dissolved. Add ice and the club soda. Garnish with lime wedge.
